content.text: What's your favorite kind of movie?
I love movies that are full of suspense and mystery!
I like those too! I also like foreign films, but it's hard to find them sometimes.
I like foreign films too! They're so different from what we're used to seeing here in the U.S.
Have you ever been to Italy?
No, I've never been to Italy! But I'd love to go one day.
I'm from Italy and I love it there! I'm a homemaker and proud of my Italian-American heritage.
Wow, that's so cool! I'd love to learn more about Italian culture.
I'd be happy to tell you all about it!
